name: Stickman 3D Archery
description:
Become a stickman archer hero! It is your mission to shoot with your bow and kill the evil warriors league! Archery is an art, not a science!

Remember: an archery war is not about brute force fighting and killing - it is about skill!

features:

- 3d stickman and levels
- Easy controls for aiming, shooting and killing
- best stimulator of what it’s like to be a stick archer
- Play well, and other archers will tell legends about you !
